Package org.tikv.common.types

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDateTimeType  
    BitType  
    BytesType
    TODO: if we need to unify string type and binary types? Indeed they are encoded as the same However, decode to string actually going through encoding/decoding by whatever charset.encoding format we set, and essentially changed underlying data
    Charset  
    Converter  
    DataType
    Base Type for encoding and decoding TiDB row information.
    DataTypeFactory  
    DateTimeType
    Datetime is a timezone neutral version of timestamp While most of decoding logic is the same it interpret as local timezone to be able to compute with date/time data
    DateType  
    DecimalType  
    EnumType  
    IntegerType  
    JsonType  
    RealType  
    SetType  
    StringType  
    TimestampType
    Timestamp in TiDB is represented as packed long including year/month and etc.
    TimeType  
    UninitializedType
    UninitializedType is created to deal with MySQLType being 0.
